# ComputeMate AI

**ComputeMate AI** is your autonomous execution engine—automating planning, orchestration, and execution of tasks using multiple tools to resolve user requests seamlessly.

Developer: Eliran Wong

## ✨ Core Features

- **Autonomous AI Agent:** ComputeMate AI can work independently to fulfill your requests for running computing tasks.
- **Multi-step Task Execution:** It can break down complex tasks into smaller, manageable steps and execute them sequentially.
- **Support Third-Party MCP Servers:** You can work with any MCP servers you want.
- **Customizable and Extensible:** Advanced users can customize existing tools or add new ones to suit their specific needs.
- **Flexible AI Backend:** Supports a variety of AI backends via [AgentMake AI](https://github.com/eliranwong/agentmake).

## Documentation
